scripts.start: npm run run start:wallet && npm run run start:localOnly && npm run run start:requireLoop && npm run run start:secp256k1 && npm run run start:newBN
scripts.start:wallet: (cd trials/wallet && npm run && npm run start)
scripts.start:localOnly: (cd trials/localOnly && npm run && npm run start)
scripts.start:requireLoop: (cd trials/requireLoop && npm run && npm run start)
scripts.start:secp256k1: (cd trials/secp256k1-mixedAdd && npm run && npm run start)
scripts.start:newBN: (cd trials/secp256k1-newBN && npm run && npm run start)
